settings.step1_p1: You can find this by looking in your settings or by looking at your device.
settings.step1_p2: Go to Settings > General > About. To the right of Model, you'll see the part number. To see the model number, tap the part number.
settings.step1_p4: To find the model number, remove the SIM tray and look in the SIM tray slot. Make sure that you're in a place with bright light overhead. The model number is on the upper sideâ€”the side with the display.
settings.step1_p5: Find the model number on the back of your device.
